short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest and best way of getting words that rhyme with the word you double clicked on! Now works in Google Docs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rhymey gets words that rhyme with words in your browser!

It's very useful for conjuring up some inspiration for writing poetry or just seeing what rhymes with your word!

- Rhymey should now work in Google Docs! 
- The selected word has to be at least 2 characters long.
- Rhymey uses the lovely datamuse api (https://www.datamuse.com/api/)
- Github here: https://github.com/goatonabicycle/Rhymey

Please feel free to give feedback and suggestions. Any issues will be met with appreciation and attention!

Thank you for being cool!
